long_description: Hanging at the beach or riding their bike, these Chili's Hang Time sunglasses are sized for kids and guard against harmful rays of the sun. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate frames are strong and acid- and heat-resistant. Sized to fit small faces.
short_description: Hanging at the beach or riding their bike, these Chili's Hang Time sunglasses are sized for kids and guard against harmful rays of the sun.
